next.name: Worthy of Offerings Dedicated to the Gods

segments.en: “Mendicants, these nine people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno, anāgāmī, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sotāpanno, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, puthujjano—
segments.en: The perfected one and the one practicing for perfection. The non-returner and the one practicing to realize the fruit of non-return. The once-returner and the one practicing to realize the fruit of once-return. The stream-enterer and the one practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry. And the ordinary person.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
segments.en: These are the nine people found in the world.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, these nine people are found in the world.…

suttaplex.blurb: Nine kinds of persons: the eight noble persons and the ordinary person.
